name: Vikings and Thrones
summary:
Follow Ragnar and his companions to conquer Europe as a viking! Maybe you can be the next Jarl? Or maybe you'll die trying and, with honour, will feast with the gods in Valhalla in this 3D action RPG!

This is a medieval electronic 3D action RPG (role-playing) war game with vikings and european (anglo-saxons) characters. You play with the vikings: your objective is to kill the highest number of enemies you can, to loot everything and to show no mercy upon those who don't fear the gods! With luck, Odin and Thor shall be by your side and your destiny is to be the best! You can share your score online after your complete the game and prove you're the chosen one!
